General.Name: OnMobile Global Limited
General.Description: OnMobile Global Limited provides telecom value added services in India, Europe, Africa, Latin America, the United States, and internationally. It offers apps and services under the ONMO brand name; and carrier services, such as ring back tones, videos, contests, and games. The company was formerly known as OnMobile Asia Pacific Private limited and changed its name to OnMobile Global Limited in August 2007. OnMobile Global Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.
